title: Bug splat
body: bug splat,don't want to open launcher

replies.body: Yes, I got a unknown error of a child killed then the league client wouldnt open and i get the bug splat screen... The child killed error really freaked me out though o.o

Bugsplats usually happen if there was a weird interaction with your system drivers or hardware. I recommend checking out our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for a list of common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
